colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES RANG DANG SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO SOGS LA BKRA SHIS KYI DGE MTSAN SPEL BA'I PHYIR BYIN 'BEBS GSOL 'DEBS AE WAm CHAR 'BEB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS SPRUL SKU DHARMA BADZRA GYI GSUNG RGYUN LTAR, @005A *, ,SHING MO YOS LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DKAR TSES GNYIS PAR DBEN GNAS AE WAm DGA' 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,LEGS SO, DGE'O, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
